```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)


capt_str <- 'Residual standard error: %.5f on %1.f degrees of freedom.
Multiple R-squared %.5f, Adjusted R-squared: %.5f.
F-statistic: %.1f on %1.f and %1.f DF, p-value: %e.'

val_order <- c('sigma', 
             'df.residual',
             'r.squared',
             'adj.r.squared',
             'statistic',
             'df',
             'df.residual',
             'p.value')

load(file = '~/Dropbox/projects/moss_manuscript/output/point_intercept_models.rda')

```


```{r echo = F}

# cleanup model output 
mod_glance <- 
  broom::glance(moss_cover_lm)  %>%    
  gather(stat, val ) 
 
quickstats <- mod_glance$val
names( quickstats ) <- mod_glance$stat
 
mynums <- as.list(quickstats[val_order])
 
my_caption <- do.call(sprintf, c(mystr, mynums))
my_tab <- broom::tidy(moss_cover_lm)

knitr::kable(my_tab, digits = c(3, 3, 2, 2), caption = 'Table 1, Moss Cover Model')
 
knitr::asis_output(my_caption)
```
